message.content:
1. The study was conducted in a double-blind fashion.
2. There were two groups of participants.
3. One group received a placebo.
4. The placebo group consisted of 25 participants.
5. The other group received tranexamic acid.
6. The tranexamic acid group also consisted of 25 participants.
7. The dosage of tranexamic acid given was 10 mg per kg intravenously.
8. The tranexamic acid was administered just before tourniquet inflation.
9. After the initial dose, the participants received 1 mg per kg per hour intravenously.

messages.content:
Statement: In a double-blind fashion, they received either placebo (n=25) or tranexamic acid (n=25)10 mg.kg−1 i.v., just before tourniquet inflation, followed by 1 mg kg−1 h-1 i.v.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
